author: Amanda Lynne
title: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelceâ€™s Family Reactions to Whirlwind Romance Revealed | The Nerd Stash
text: [Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce’s relationship](https://thenerdstash.com/travis-kelce-planning-a-romantic-surprise-for-taylor-swift-amid-relationship-chaos/) has been the topic of conversation among fans for months. However, it seems that the famous couple’s families are also very invested in their romance. Sources reveal that the singer’s parents, brother, and the NFL tight end’s close family members have reacted to their whirlwind romance. Of course, their loved ones are thrilled that the pair have found each other and seemingly [fallen head over heels](https://thenerdstash.com/travis-kelce-drops-a-huge-bomb-on-taylor-swift-after-steamy-new-year-together/). [OK! Magazine](https://okmagazine.com/p/taylor-swift-travis-kelce-families-happy-whirlwind-romance/) reports that [Swift and Kelce’s families](https://thenerdstash.com/taylor-swifts-entire-family-shows-up-to-support-travis-kelce-on-christmas/) think they are perfect for each other. It’s been made clear that the duo are smitten with one another. Even their families can’t deny how happy they’ve been together. “[Theyâ€™re] closer than ever before and everyone around them can see that theyâ€™re an amazing match,” an insider tells the outlet. Taylor Swift and Travis Kelceâ€™s Relationship Is the Real Deal “Their families are both on board and everyone on Travisâ€™ side loves Taylor and vice versa. Itâ€™s a supportive dynamic all around. Their loved ones have never seen either of them so happy and hope and believe that it will continue.” “They love being together no matter what theyâ€™re doing and appreciate the little things in life.” The source continued, “They try to lead as normal lives as possible as a couple and are enjoying the upswing and growth in their relationship. They believe that timing is everything and that this is their time,” says the source. In addition to [Taylor Swift](https://thenerdstash.com/tag/taylor-swift) and Travis Kelce having their families’ approval of their romance, fans also love the pairing. The duo has taken the world by storm, and everyone is waiting to see what the future holds for the beloved couple as their romance blossoms. Meanwhile, speculation that [the pair may get engaged](https://thenerdstash.com/taylor-swift-and-travis-kelces-holiday-plans-revealed-amid-engagement-rumors/) and even walk down the aisle in 2024 has spread online like wildfire. Their status as the Hollywood “it” couple has been cemented.
